system.description:
At 2nd level, you have learned to store up a stock of restorative energy that you can use to aid those who need your care. You have a healing pool equal to 3 x your pious protector level. When you restore hit points to a creature with a spell, class feature, or feat, you can draw upon this pool and cause the creature to heal an additional number of hit points of your choice.

This pool is restored at the end of a long rest.
